description: T.1 Oak (Tag 299) - 4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood and remove any damaged, hanging or crossing branches.T.3 Oak - 4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood and remove any damaged, hanging or crossing branches.T.5 Lime (Tag 293) - Re-Pollard to previous points at 14m from ground level & reduce large rising limb to the North West down to leave a finished limb length of 5m.T.6  Lime (Tag 292) - Fell.T.8 Oak (Tag 291) - 4m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood and remove any damaged, hanging or crossing branches.T.9 Oak (Tag 289) - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood and remove any damaged, hanging or crossing branches.G.10 (TG1) Holly - Reduce to height of 2.5m from ground level.
